description: Try our easy to follow Three Aussie Farmers Slow Cooked Pulled Beef Super Easy Thai Salad recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Noodle salad,Seafood free,Soy free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Beef,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Three Aussie Farmers Slow Cooked Pulled Beef Super Easy Thai Salad Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 pkt Three Aussie Farmers Pulled Beef

recipeInstructions.text: Combine vermicelli noodles, bean sprouts, red onion, capsicum, cucumber and coriander into a large bowl.
Drizzle with sweet chilli sauce and stir through.
Top with pulled beef and fried shallots.
Finish off with a squeeze of lime and enjoy!
